column4: I am trying to install Ubuntu 9.10 on my Toshiba A135-S2266 Satellite laptop. When it comes to the menu to type my name I have no keyboard or mouse. I've been working on this all day and cannot figure out a solution. I hooked up an external keyboard and mouse to get install. Can anyone help me with this?
ouch, sounds difficult.  It works when you connect the externals?
if you do lsusb in the terminal, does it show your built in gear?
